title: Mitsuiro Devil
alternative_title: 蜜色DEVIL ; Honey Colored Devil ; Mitsu Iro Devil ; Mitsu-iro Devil ; Méz-színű Ördög
status: 蜜色DEVIL ; Honey Colored Devil ; Mitsu Iro Devil ; Mitsu-iro Devil ; Méz-színű Ördög
description:
Description :
        From StarryHeaven: Hashiba Rin lives together with her grandpa. One day, while she was praying to the gods at a shrine, a devil calling himself Char appeared. Char who seeks the "blood of a virgin" is perverted, ill-tempered, and pompous. He isn't very straightforward, but the truth is that his kind touch is full of love, and while knowing an unforgivable a love before he knew it, his heart and body grew weak...

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 5 : If I See You In My Dreams
Vol.1 Chapter 2 : Honey Colored Devil - Pt. 2
